about_the_game:
Ladies and Gentlemen!!!
It`s very Fantastic Amazing Incredible Hyper Ultra Awesome Cool Wonderful Excellent Impressive Sweet game!
This game is full of hidden elements, tricks, and parodies.
However, it is difficult to find the hidden elements without any hints.
So the basic way to play this game is to discover the hidden elements and progress through the story while looking at the walkthrough wiki built into the game.
A variety of mini-games lurk throughout the game, including old-fashioned choice adventures, shooting games, clicker games, lateral thinking games, quizzes, jumping games, action games, racing games, and more.
The greatest appeal of this game is finding hidden elements and trying to clear the game.
I can't give away any secrets, so I can't give you any detailed explanations. You'll just have to buy it!
Tom: "But it's only available in Japanese language. Is there no English version?"
"sorry. then I took an arrow in the knee... "

content_descriptors.notes:
*One of the vast genres included in this game
is a slightly 'a little naughty' element that was very rare back in the Super Nintendo era.
It's not as 'naughty' as the adult content that's so prevalent these days.
However, it's the kind of 'a little naughty' that the author would have been happy to read in a general magazine back in the days before the Internet.
Also, there are some 'a little naughty' scenes within the comedy, so I don't think it will make you feel that 'naughty', .

detailed_description:
Ladies and Gentlemen!!!
It`s very Fantastic Amazing Incredible Hyper Ultra Awesome Cool Wonderful Excellent Impressive Sweet game!
This game is full of hidden elements, tricks, and parodies.
However, it is difficult to find the hidden elements without any hints.
So the basic way to play this game is to discover the hidden elements and progress through the story while looking at the walkthrough wiki built into the game.
A variety of mini-games lurk throughout the game, including old-fashioned choice adventures, shooting games, clicker games, lateral thinking games, quizzes, jumping games, action games, racing games, and more.
The greatest appeal of this game is finding hidden elements and trying to clear the game.
I can't give away any secrets, so I can't give you any detailed explanations. You'll just have to buy it!
